title: Swarna Valayalu: Diamond-Studded Wave Bangles
materials: G-H color). Hallmarked for gold purity. Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Modern wave design (S-curve) bangle featuring bezel-set brilliant cut diamonds. The wavy gold design creates a unique and eye-catching silhouette. Each diamond is meticulously set for maximum brilliance. Offers a contemporary twist to traditional bangle design.
colors: Warm yellow gold and dazzling white diamonds. A classic and elegant color combination.
occasions: and special occasions. Can be paired with traditional sarees or contemporary outfits. Ideal for festive occasions or a sophisticated everyday look.
description: Combines modern design with the timeless appeal of gold and diamonds. The wavy design is unique and sets it apart from traditional bangles. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability. A beautiful investment piece that can be passed down through generations.
